data.text:
We have been at The Crowne Plaza hotel for the past week and have found all the staff extremely friendly and helpful. We would like to make a special mention of the Guest Relation RIM who helped us  deal with any problems. RIM went above and beyond to deal with everything and made our stay more comfortable. The rooms were spacious and clean with a wonderful view .
We will surely be back again.
data.title: Hotle staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear sajdb2023,
The entire hotel staff expresses their gratitude to you for writing such fabulous words about our hotel and our staff and we will pass on your comments to our staff with pleasure. We thank you for sharing your experience and choosing Crowne Plaza Antalya for your stay. We will be waiting for you in our hotel, please come soon for a new beatiful experience and we will be glad to provide you with quality service you deserve. 
Sincerely,
Crowne Plaza Antalya
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Manager

data.text: We stayed at The Crowne Plaza hotel for 10 days last November and found all the staff extremely friendly and helpful. We would like to make a special mention of the Guest Relations Team who helped us to organise trips and deal with any problems. Thank you Fonde, Rim and Yasin. The quality of the food was excellent and we enjoyed the roof top bar. The rooms were spacious and clean with a wonderful view overlooking the sea front.
data.title: Wonderful stay in Antalya

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 830davidh,
First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing Crowne Plaza Antalya for your holiday and for giving your feedback. We will pass on your comments to our staff with pleasure. We are happy to offer you a privileged experience and a relaxing time. We will be waiting for you in our hotel, please come soon for a new beatiful experience and we will be glad to provide you with quality service you deserve. 
Kind Regards,
Crowne Plaza Antalya
owner_response.author: Crowne Plaza Antalya

data.text: Crowne plaza hotel provide a good facilities of room amenities rooms are spacious and beautiful and the yummy food at Kaansa also the staff are very well mannered and amazing specially Arun also the guest relations from reception Helped me to arranged room amenities and cake special thanks to Manisha .
data.title: Amazing Hospitality

data.text:
Hotel is clean and services are what one would expect from a premier hotel. Very professional and well organised.

The staff are outstanding! Namely, a duty manager Serkant, the security team member Necla and guest services representative Funda who made the stay and ability to navigate the city all the more easy and enjoyable! They are highly professional and dedicated to making the experience enjoyable for all. 

I would highly recommend these people and this hotel, as a result, to families and for business stays. You will not be disappointed!
data.title: Great staff and a good hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear JS982,
Thank you so much for your kind words. We are glad you felt right at home during your stay! We take pride in our staff and clean rooms and thrilled to know that you enjoyed your time with us. We will be sure to pass on your compliments to the team. It was our pleasure to have you as our guests and we hope you will come back and see us again soon!
Warm Regards,
Crowne Plaza Antalya Family
owner_response.author: Crowne Plaza Antalya

data.text: The place is amazing and beautiful.  Wonderful reception and exceptional service. We had a lovely family time. I would like to thank Necle and Tolhe for the kindness they received us every time. They are truly wonderful people.. thank you for evry thing
data.title: Family trip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 553fatink,
First of all, we would like to thank you for taking your precious time to share your opinion about our facility on the site. We are happy to read that you were generally satisfied with your stay.
Your positive and nice comments motivate us and our colleagues. Your nice comments will definitely be shared with our colleagues and department managers.
We hope to welcome you again in our facility as soon as possible.
Kind Regards
Crowne Plaza Antalya
owner_response.author: Crowne Plaza Antalya
